text: Al-Fayha is a Saudi Arabian football club from Al-Majma'ah, Saudi Arabia. It was founded on 1953. It currently plays on Saudi Professional League. It currently play home stadium on Al-Majma'ah Sports City. == History == On 2017, Al-Fayha was promoted to Saudi Professional League for the first time. On 1 September 2024, Chris Smalling joined Al-Fayha. == Players == === Out on loan === == References == == Other websites == * Category:1953 establishments in Asia Category:Saudi Arabian football clubs
title: Al-Fayha FC
